nodes.text: The Silver Fulgur was a tavern located on the planet of Alzaris, in the Rama system. The bartender was Roxard, a former member of the Imperial Army.
It was regularly frequented by the imperial crew of the local space station, but mostly by local inhabitants.

The "Silver Fulgur" (Fulgur d'argent in the French original text) was created by Jean Balczesak for the ambiguously canon roleplaying scenario "Hold-up galactique" which appeared in the French magazine Casus Belli 62.
